title: Bug 6322: All types dialog shows obfuscated classes
description: Bug 6322: When using JDK 1.4, the All types dialog shows obfuscated classes such as 'a', 'a1', 'b', 'c', 'd', etc. These classes should be less prominent or somehow differentiated from non-obfuscated classes.
OB: When using JDK 1.4, the All types dialog incorrectly displays obfuscated classes as prominent entries.
EB: The obfuscated classes should be shown as less prominent or differentiated from non-obfuscated classes in the All types dialog.
SR: Modify the All types dialog to present obfuscated classes in a way that differentiates them from non-obfuscated classes.
